title: SC EP:308 Killing Sasquatch
itunes:title: SC EP:308 Killing Sasquatch
description:
Tom Sewid, Tony Merkel ("The Confessionals" podcast), Duke Sullivan (World Bigfoot Radio), Chuck and Woody join the show tonight. We will be discussing as a roundtable how to kill a Sasquatch, what should be done afterwards, and the unforeseen consequences of killing one of these creatures.

Should one be shot and killed?
content:encoded:

Should one be shot and killed?
